1: Ah, you're back. Now that is a surprise. I still remember the last time you were here. You hated the place and tried to get out of here as soon as possible. And when I told you that you were here by your own design, you wouldn't believe me.
There it is, that look on your face again. You won't believe me again. *Regret*. It's such a wonderful feeling, isn't it?
Yes, you are here because *you* wanted to be here. That's how this place works. How to leave, you ask me? I don't know. It was you who left last time, so why don't you ask yourself?
2: I do remember one thing, yes. You did not tell me much last time. almost as if you wanted to keep it a *secret*. But I remember you mentioning a *Sphere*.
What kind of sphere? How would I know?
3: ... Have you found your way out yet?
